item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yea, I didn’t quite understand what they were trying to say. I thought they meant that they have code you copy and then add features to. I was WRONG.

I might start on that, but not right now.

Read full topic

item.title: ChatServer v3
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:27, topic:317552”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=414065.msg3057455#msg3057455 date=1260593421]
ps it isnt copying, its implementing
[/quote]
The other people already cleared that up, but thanks.[/quote]

Just to try to add more clarification, you would read this:

[quote=“atrox_, post:30, topic:317552”]http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc1459.html

read.[/quote]

And then write your own code implementing the protocol. It would be 100% your code and would be compatible with other clients and/or servers.

Read full topic

item.title: ChatServer v3
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:37, topic:317552”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=414065.msg3058217#msg3058217 date=1260654565]

I encourage you to write an irc server that does not suck for windows. Even though most irc servers are hosted on linux it would be nice if you could write on windows that isn’t over 9000 years old.

whats wrong with unreal?

It’s ok, but I want an irc server that works straight out of the box. (I hate configuring shit because i’m retarded)
[/quote]
Doesn’t meant they suck, it means you suck.[/quote]

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:36, topic:317552”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=414065.msg3057970#msg3057970 date=1260642319]

I encourage you to write an irc server that does not suck for windows. Even though most irc servers are hosted on linux it would be nice if you could write on windows that isn’t over 9000 years old.

whats wrong with unreal?
[/quote]
It’s ok, but I want an irc server that works straight out of the box. (I hate configuring shit because i’m retarded)[/quote]

ps, you could make binaries for yourself if you wanted to.

Read full topic

item.title: ChatServer v3
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:20, topic:317552”]That’s nice guys, but I prefer to invent my own shitty protocol.

As I said, I do not want to use anyone else’s work, even if I do learn more. I feel like I would just C+P the main part…

I might study it, to see how it works to learn, but I would not release it.[/quote]Uhh, by reading the procol specification of IRC you CAN’T copy paste cus its theoretic info with no code…

Read full topic
